test.label: analyze
test.comment: This test is mainly for figuring out what characters are in the data.

test.label: medial beh sequence
test.comment: These test situations where we need to back up in pass 5 in order to handle a sequence of behs.

test.label: dal w/ two dots and toa
reh/zain nuqta positions
test.string: مږ عز فڑ ظژ سژ صڑ ہز بہژ لز لژ جز خژ گڑ

test.label: new heh doachashmee
test.string: ودھارے پڑھ اہتھ رکھڋ سمجھ جتھاں

test.label: Latin spacing
test.string: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

test.label: year sign in context
test.comment: Note that no app should pass data like this, because it mixes RTL and LTR data.
test.string: نے ڋہ دسمبر 8491؁ کوں انسانی حقوق

test.label: Alternate meem
test.string: عما سکمل جمد ظملا فمل ممݪ

test.label: cIniBeHg_BeRe
test.string: ببنر جبنر سبنر صبنر طبنر عبنر فبنر کبنر لبنر مبنر ہبنر ھبنر

test.label: bismillah text
test.comment: This probably doesn't include all the vowel marks.
test.string: بِسمِ اللہ الرَّ حمن الرَّ حࣿیمِ

test.label: short seq 3
test.string: اور قدر اور مردوں اور عورتوں روزہ

test.label: kaf 300
test.string: ارک آسُودگی آوارگی اَوگُوستُس اَیساگُمراہ آتاکہ

test.label: kern test 1
test.comment: This is the sample I sent to Sheldon and Malachi to ask about kerning and spacing.
test.string: اقوام متحدہ نے ہر کہیں دے حقوق دی

test.label: kern test 2
test.string: تے مجبور تھیوڻ کنوں بچاوڻ کیتے ضروری

test.label: Urdu - long 1
test.string: چونکہ ہر انسان کی ذاتی عزت اور حرمت اور انسانوں کے مساوی اور ناقابلِ انتقال

test.label: Urdu - long 2
test.string: میں اپنے عقیدے کی دوبارہ تصدیق کردی ہے اور وسیع تر آزادی کی فضا میں

test.label: Urdu - long 3
test.string: جایٔے گا۔ چاہے وہ ملک یا علاقہ آزاد ہو یا تولیتی ہو یا غیر مختار ہو یا سیاسی اقتدار کے لحاظ سے

test.label: Urdu - long 4
test.string: ہر شخص کو ان افعال کے خلاف جو اس دستور یا قانون میں دیٔے ہویٔے بنیادی حقوق

test.label: Saraiki - long 1
test.string: ایند اعام اعلان کیتا ۔ اگلے صفیاں تے اینہ منشور دی پوری عبارت پیش کیتی ویندی اے ۔

test.label: Saraiki - long 2
test.string: آکھڻ تے آپڻے عقیدے تے قائم رہوڻ دی ازادی ہووے ۔ کوئی ڋر خوف نہ ہووے اتے

test.label: Saraiki - long 3
test.string: ڋو جھی حیثیت کنوں قطع نظر انہاں سارے حقوق تے ازادیاں دا حقدار ہے جتھاں داذ کر اعلان وچ

test.label: Saraiki - long 4
test.string: لوندے ٻال بچیاں کیتے عزت دی حیاتی دا ضامن ہووے اتے اوندے وچ ضرورت دے

test.label: final reh overlap
test.string: ہر شخص جر شخص عر شخص بہر شخص

test.label: isolate waw + long seq (Malachi - 4)
test.comment: There is not enough space after the isolate waw.

test.label: pa + k (Malachi - 6)
test.comment: Expects the alef to be closer to the kaf. Sheldon says: The vertical part of the kaf and the alef should be spaced as two alefs or an ale lam would.

test.label: full stop (Malachi - 7)
test.comment: Full stop way too close to the following word.

test.label: xalifa (Malachi - 10)
test.comment: Need more space before the second word.
test.string: اور خلیفة | پنے خلیفة | کہ خلیفة

test.label: debana khuda (Eunice)
test.comment: Fixed.

test.label: alef + yeh + meem (Dieter)
test.comment: If the nuqtas were moved down, the alef could scootch in.

test.label: reh + yeh (Dieter)
test.comment: Too far apart

test.label: sheen + kaf (Dieter)
test.comment: Would look better a bit closer together.

test.label: not enough overlap (Sheldon)
test.comment: The third example is good, the first two are not tight enough.
test.string: کویی شحض | کہیں شحض | برشحض کوں

test.label: nyeh (Eunice)
test.comment: Dots too high and to the right. It looks better to me in Graide than it did in Eunice's PDF.

test.label: kaf heh-goal sp jeem
test.string: کہ خلیفة | کہ خل | لہ خل | سہ خسم | قہ خک

test.label: dal + heh-do
test.comment: spacing too close?

test.label: reh + heh-do
test.comment: too close?

test.label: waw + alef
test.comment: Dieter: pull waw and alef together a bit

test.label: reh/waw/dal + yeh/peh/teh
test.comment: Eunice; also beh?
test.string: شزدیو زیربو۔ زیرے، وزیر دِیو کھوغزیر زِیزی

test.label: isolate reh
test.comment: I guess this is okay because there is no space after the reh.

test.label: overlaps
test.comment: Eunice - she doesn't' like the overlap
test.string: رگسکتی تبل کھیان٘ی بخستون عالِم کُن اِمام کُنی

test.label: reh + nuqta
test.comment: heh-do -> seen

test.label: peh + waw + peh
test.comment: removed initial kaf

test.label: yeh + final tcheh
test.comment: Why is the triple-nuqta moved down far enough to create a collision? Is that because the tcheh is jumpable?

test.label: lam + theh + theh + kaf
test.comment: The left side of the lam is keeping the triple-nuqta from moving.

test.label: alef-madda + kaf
test.comment: heh-do -> seen

test.label: alef + lam + ghain
test.comment: ain -> khah

test.label: alef + takhalus + kaf
test.comment: heh-goal -> seen

test.label: ref + ... + ain-final
test.comment: ain -> jeem

test.label: alef + peh + yeh
test.comment: Why doesn't it just move the triple-nuqta right and then kern?

test.label: theh + waw + teh
test.comment: The kerning is done too late to let the triple-nuqta move to the left.

test.label: noon + noon + gaf
test.comment: Why is the nuqta jumping the gaf?

test.label: gaf + teh + hamza-waw
test.comment: Why doesn't it move the double-nuqta up? BECAUSE it thinks it can't cross the gaf. Argghh!

test.label: alef + noon + takhalus + teh
test.comment: Why is the takhalus not moving? It sets flags to 3 instead of 2.

test.label: lots of fun
test.comment: Same problem - the zabar is being marked FIX+IGNORE.

test.label: alef-madda tey
test.comment: The adjustment is so small you can't really see it.

test.label: zabar + 2nuqta
test.comment: meem -> seen

test.label: sheen + sheen + teh
test.comment: The offset between the second triple-nuqta and the double-nuqta is not what I would expect from minxoffset = 150m.

test.label: alef + beh + chotiyeh
test.comment: The ordering of the nuqtas does not seem to reflect maxoverlap.

test.label: beh + yeh + jeem
test.comment: The centers of the first single-nuqta and the double-nuqta does not reflect minxoffset.

test.label: teh + hamza-waw
test.comment: The double-nuqta is centered over the hamza - it should be further to the right.

test.label: zair + following chotiyeh
test.comment: Is it a problem that the zair is not to the right of the following nuqta?

test.label: alef + teh + kaf
test.comment: Should be easy to fix.

test.label: teh + khah + kaf
test.comment: For the double-nuqta, max.x = 500m which should be enough to move it away from the top of the kaf.

test.label: teh + jeem + kaf
test.comment: This is a tricky in Nafees, but not so much in Awami.

test.label: gaf + zabar
test.comment: Can't move the zabar far enough to the right to solve the problem.

test.label: khah + noon + gaf
test.comment: No good solution.
